text: Valentina Khokhlova (born 10 February 1949 in Lipetsk, Russia) is a Belarusian rowing coxswain. She competed in the women's coxed four at the 1988 Summer Olympics and the women's eight at the 2000 Summer Olympics and won three World Rowing Championships gold medals in the eight class. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Belarus Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Coxswains (rowing)
title: Valentina Khokhlova
